channel.title: Need Help Switching Clients | Repping Helpers
channel.description:
I'm Using The Source From This: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,517045.0.html And The Client from This: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=407757.0
Nothing has worked so far, so if someone could do it for me, and add them in one folder with a download link, that would be awsome.
I have no idea what to do anymore, trust me i've tried changing the ip's so don't suggest it. Please someone help.

item.title: Need Help Switching Clients | Repping Helpers
item.dc:creator: @Xevi Xevi
item.description:
@Xevi wrote:

This is the best client i’ve seen tbh, I really need help though.

Anyone help?

Read full topic
